name: Escape (itch) (reaperaru)
description: As the player you need to avoid obstacles and look for a route to escape. You will have to explore the map and face the enemies which can choose to avoid or combat. You can increase health by looting potion from the ground and get score from killing the enemies. You can either uses arrow keys or WASD to maneuver around the map. Z key and X key for damage. When you reaches to another map, the system will automatically save and you will face higher difficulty challenge. You will die if the character touch the spike or killed by enemies. However, you can press R key to respawn and continue the game.
